::Zeus/Annihilator/Killer/Ares::

Destroying another annoying autogun, Zeus sees Blue Stinger attack Unitron. 
He laughs, transforming into an eagle and launching himself up into the sky, 
he flies after Blue Stinger, firing missiles from under his wings, not 
hearing Shuko's orders.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Yeeeehaaa!!" Annihilator yells, jumping out from a boulder behind Antagony, 
chain guns firing. He laughs as he hears Shuko's orders. This was just 
getting fun, the couldn't leave now! He keeps firing, laughing like a maniak.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killer jumps forward, spinning as he does so and landing behind Sona, firing 
a rocket at her back, the noise of the battle preventing him from hearing 
Shuko's orders.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hearing the orders to fall back, Ares transforms back into robot mode, 
walking slowly backwards and firing multiple shots at the Ark's shields.
